ability: [Main] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost equal to or less than the number of your opponent's Life cards.
trigger: [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

name: Upper Yard
ability: [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Sky Island} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
